data.name: IT Pro Camp 2020
data.description: Putting on an event of this size takes a lot of people. To keep the costs down, we need generous people like you to volunteer your time. Sign up using the button below, As a Reward, all voluteers will be able to take the certification testing on Friday evening before the event. Now how cool is thatâ€¦

relatedRecords.name: AllThingsRTC 2020
relatedRecords.description: The Agora AllThingsRTC 2020 event will take place at the Metreon City View in San Francisco on August 27. Submit to the AllThingsRTC 2020 Conference Call for Papers and become a recognized expert in Real-Time Communications (RTC).
